archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.4.2f: f) the rights of the organisation regarding ownership of information stored on removable media (e.g. all information stored on removable media remains the property of the organisation)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
